title: How to write a letter for a vacation request - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello Thanks for A2A. Here you go with an answer. Tell your boss in formal email like this. I am bringing to your an attention regarding my leave vacation request. I am planned to go for vacation and back up has been created during my obsence to take care of the work. So, I would appreciate if you approve my PTO (Personal Time Off), so that I can plan my further activities to fly for vacation and I will be back to office on so and so date. And also mention who is the piont of contact to reach out during your absence. Keep the out of office mail and enjoy your vacation:) That's how I used to write to my manager for vacation leave request? Thanks Suresh

If you need your request in writing (which I suggest, because you never know when your boss will forget what you said), you could write something like this: Dear [boss], I’m writing to request off [dates] for [reason]. Please let me know if this works. Sincerely, [your name]
